_inspectorSnowReport.Report:
Bonjour Tremblant!

Due to windy conditions forecasted for today and an ice layer covering the mountain this morning, our teams are hard at work to prepare the terrain safely. In these conditions, grooming and trail preparation take significantly more time than usual.

As a result, many trails will open progressively throughout the morning, with the Soleil side making its comeback today—slopes on this side will also open gradually as conditions improve. Despite everything, First Tracks will still be available to enjoy on the North Side! Please be careful on the slopes, as conditions will be very variable across the mountain terrain today.

We invite you to check this webpage regularly for the latest updates as terrain openings evolve. Thank you for your patience and understanding, and have a great day on the mountain!

Mountain safety tip of the week: Be careful when using the ski lifts.
Knowing how to board ski lifts is essential to ensure the safety of all users.
 
Snow fall is recorded daily at 5 a.m from mid-mountain at North Side (550 m / 1,800 ft). This data, based on 24 hours, provides a picture of on-mountain conditions. Actual accumulation may differ from the official report. Be aware of changing conditions. Lifts and trails exist in a mountain environment and may close due to weather, usage and/or special maintenance.
_inspectorSnowReport.SafetyReport: This Saturday, conditions will be windy all day, and an ice layer is covering the mountain this morning, making skiing conditions very variable across the entire resort. Many trails, including the terrain parks, will therefore open progressively throughout the morning. Despite this, the Soleil sides is making its comeback today! Please ski carefully and enjoy your day on the slopes!
_inspectorSnowReport.SafetyReportFrench: Ce samedi, les conditions seront venteuses toute la journée, et une couche de glace recouvre la montagne ce matin, rendant les conditions de ski très variables sur l’ensemble du domaine. De nombreuses pistes, incluant les parcs à neige, ouvriront donc progressivement en cours de matinée. Malgré tout, le versant Soleil fera son retour aujourd’hui! Soyez prudents sur les pistes et bon ski!
